name: Roland Banks
desc: Reaction Trigger: After you defeat an enemy: Discover 1 clue at your location (Limit once per round)
eldritch: +1 for each clue at your location.
feature: 在你擊敗一名敵人後，發現所在地點的一個線索。(每輪只限一次)

name: Daisy Walker
desc: You may take an additional action during your turn, which can only be used on Tome action abilities.
eldritch: +0. If you succeed, draw 1 card for each Tome you control

name: "Skids" O’Toole
desc: Fast Reaction: During your turn, spend 2 resources: You may take an additional action this turn (Limit once per turn)

name: Agnes Baker
desc: Reaction Trigger: After 1 or more horror is placed on Agnes Baker: Deal 1 damage to an enemy at your location (Limit once per phase)
eldritch: +1 for each horror on Agnes Baker.

name: Wendy Adams
desc: Reaction Trigger: When you reveal a chaos token, choose and discard 1 card from your hand: Cancel that chaos token and return it to the bag. Reveal a new chaos token (Limit once per turn)
eldritch: +0. If Wendy’s Amulet is in play, you automatically succeed instead.
feature: 丟棄一張手牌重新檢定一次。(每次檢定只限一次)
star: 如果溫娣的護身符在場，自動成功
